data.trans: Ra lệnh khẩn cấp, chỉ trích
data.trans_hint: Mọi người đã gọi cô ấy vì những bình luận tiêu cực.
data.en_hint: People were calling her out for the negative comments.
data.content_game_1: People were calling her out for the negative comments.
data.answer_en_hint: People were calling her out for the negative comments.

data.trans_hint: Cách mà chủ nhà chào đón chúng tôi khiến cho chúng tôi tin rằng mình sẽ có một đêm thật tuyệt vời
data.en_hint: The way the host welcomed us made us believe that we were in for a great night.
data.content_game_1: The way the host welcomed us made us believe that we were in for a great night.
data.answer_en_hint: The way the host welcomed us made us believe that we were in for a great night.

data.trans: Tận hưởng, cảm thấy vui thích, hào hứng
data.trans_hint: Buổi hòa nhạc đã không làm tôi thất vọng. Quả thực, tôi cảm thấy cực kỳ vui thích.
data.en_hint: The concert didn't disappoint me. Indeed, I enjoyed myself every much.
data.content_game_1: The concert didn't disappoint me. Indeed, I enjoyed myself every much.
data.answer_en_hint: The concert didn't disappoint me. Indeed, I enjoyed myself every much.

data.trans_hint: Có quá nhiều người chen chúc vào một căn phòng nhỏ đến nỗi mà tất cả chúng tôi đều bị khó thở.
data.en_hint: There were so many people squeezing into such a small room that we all had to fight for breath.
data.content_game_1: There were so many people squeezing into such a small room that we all had to fight for breath.
data.answer_en_hint: There were so many people squeezing into such a small room that we all had to fight for breath.

data.trans_hint: Khi Coldplay bước ra, tất cả mọi người đều phát cuồng lên.
data.en_hint: When Coldplay came on, everyone went crazy.
data.content_game_1: When Coldplay came on, everyone went crazy.
data.answer_en_hint: When Coldplay came on, everyone went crazy.

data.trans_hint: Khi chúng tôi thấy đám đông trở nên cuồng nhiệt, chúng tôi biết rằng màn trình diễn này đã cực kỳ thành công.
data.en_hint: When we saw the crowd going crazy, we knew that the performance had gone down a bomb.
data.content_game_1: When we saw the crowd going crazy, we knew that the performance had gone down a bomb.
data.answer_en_hint: When we saw the crowd going crazy, we knew that the performance had gone down a bomb.

data.trans: Sống cho khoảnh khắc hiện tại
data.trans_hint: Tự chìm đắm trong âm nhạc chính là một sống cho khoảnh khắc hiện tại.
data.en_hint: Immersing yourself in music is a way to live for the moment.
data.content_game_1: Immersing yourself in music is a way to live for the moment.
data.answer_en_hint: Immersing yourself in music is a way to live for the moment.

data.trans: Chen chúc trong một nơi chật hẹp
data.trans_hint: Tôi không thích đi tới những buổi hòa nhạc bởi vì tôi ghét phải chen chúc trong một nơi chật hẹp
data.en_hint: I don't like going to concerts because I hate being packed in like sardines.
data.content_game_1: I don't like going to concerts because I hate being packed in like sardines.
data.answer_en_hint: I don't like going to concerts because I hate being packed in like sardines.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã hét lên khi ba đưa cho tôi tấm vé đi tới show của Maroon 5 ở Thái Lan trong mùa hè này.
data.en_hint: I screamed my head off when my dad gave me tickets to the Maroon 5 show in Thailand this summer.
data.content_game_1: I screamed my head off when my dad gave me tickets to the Maroon 5 show in Thailand this summer.
data.answer_en_hint: I screamed my head off when my dad gave me tickets to the Maroon 5 show in Thailand this summer.

data.trans_hint: Tôi thích bật nhạc trong ô tô và hát theo những bài yêu thích.
data.en_hint: I love playing music in the car and sing along to my favorite songs.
data.content_game_1: I love playing music in the car and sing along to my favorite songs.
data.answer_en_hint: I love playing music in the car and sing along to my favorite songs.

data.trans: Thử, kiểm tra cái gì đó
data.trans_hint: Ban nhạc đã phải mất khá nhiều thời gian để kiểm tra các nhạc cụ.
data.en_hint: It took a band quite some time to test the instruments out.
data.content_game_1: It took a band quite some time to test the instruments out.
data.answer_en_hint: It took a band quite some time to test the instruments out.

data.trans: Lôi kéo, thuyết phục ai về phía mình
data.trans_hint: Ban đầu thì tôi không thích Bruno Mar bởi vì ngoại hình anh ta, nhưng sau khi nghe một vài bài hát của anh ấy, tôi đã bị thuyết phục.
data.en_hint: I didn't like Bruno Mars at first due to his appearance, but after listening to several songs of his, i was won over.
data.content_game_1: I didn't like Bruno Mars at first due to his appearance, but after listening to several songs of his, i was won over.
data.answer_en_hint: I didn't like Bruno Mars at first due to his appearance, but after listening to several songs of his, i was won over.
